title: Advanced Bot tests LIVE in Normals

replies.body: op.gg has our back :)
Ahahahaha, I got trolled so hard. Sitting there the entire game, are they bots? They seem like people.
I was like, are we really getting invaded by bots? really?
They are players. System just mask their ID and muted chats. :D

Agree, found evidence in chat room, the bots maybe disguised by riot worker or someone, and personally I don't think our current computer programming is that advanced to create such program which has kind of self evolving and random behaviour? Maybe just a fools day jk.
No bots have BM... just saying but they are bots. they dont even use emotes.people use emotes

I can say, almost consistently, whenever I used my mastery emote 90% of the "bots" responded with theirs, although nearly all of them were mastery 6 or 7. Also one time there was a fed jax on their team and did the emote auto cancel extremely fast so all you could hear was his pole smacking a minion but not doing any damage. Another thing, at one point these 'bots' surrendered right after we got baron even though they still had a chance of winning.
I think this is programmed, riot blocked /all chat and changed names into bots and send few random set lines at the end whether we lost or won
they used, once I saw 'gg human :)'
Explain Nintendo's Amiibos then
It is just a prank but we do have that technology
same lol
Riot i still want my icon, please... :D
i sat there the entire game thinking theyre rito employees so i destroyed them like they did my elo{{champion:157}}
{{champion:157}} :)

Is this april fools joke?

It's not a joke, just got rolled by these things...

Edit: Ok maybe they aren't bots I just checked op.gg and they have summoners names man I'm out
Holy crap, did you actually think these were bots, AHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHHAHAHHHAHHHAHHAHAHAHHAHAHAH!!!!

the summoner names are taken from current summoners who are inactive. they dont use emotes, bad mouth by flashing masteries, Have masteries ( notable after they kill you), perform flawless split second damage rotation in and out (similar but better too the current bots), if threatened will evade using same manuevers that skuttle uses
they are bots, riot just uses the names so you cant say that it was a bot match.

LOL , Dude at the end of the game they talk to us and in game i got all my friends to Ctrl 6 and Ctrl 1234 and the "bots" eventually did it back. If you seriously believe that this wasn't April fools then riot got you so well. At the end of the first game we sent friend requests and they accepted. They as in "bots" lol.
Yeha same thought they were bots cause they were playing real weird until after game they had normal summoner names.
they talked back to us after the game aswell .-.
check the summoner name profiles you will find they havent been on in a while. they never used an emote. they were bots not people.
Yeah, probably to be honest. Hey, aren't you the best Thresh and Vayne OCE?
Yeah I am so?
probably
that was actually really good. well played rito
Yeah, because they've never done this before on april fools.....

Lol
how many times people got fooled by this was hilarious  {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
It is a troll I serached up op.gg and its real people trying to trick you, nice one riot :)
Hi

I really do wish Rito could develop an AI system this 'advanced' I guess you could call it. Lets just say they did actually create it (which I highly doubt), it would have taken well over 2 years of almost full dedication to make them this mechanically complex. However, the fact that these 'bots' surrendered during one of my games would make them redundant because they are there for training purposes. Enemies who surrender generally don't make for good training tools. (Specifically training **tools**)

If this is bots...why are all the bots on my team like beginner lvl, afk or just generally retarded...and the bots of the other team like diamond 1?

..oh wait, forgot the ppl on my team arent bots...sheitt
Thats horrorble imagine we are also AI in our emery's eyes. AI can also learn during the game , so do we. Its just some higher creatures game which we exists.
April fools are we :D
{{item:3087}} OP
cool
April 2nd fooled me haha, worked out after game haha
Whoever searches up the names in op.gg there are retard a.there are people that already have every champion name with bot, it so iconic.
APRIL FOOLS LOL

Will we get a icon though :D 
Rito: "in a few weeks" 
-.- *10 years later*
So... where's that April 1 icon we were getting in a few weeks?
I got one, its a weird electric brain thing in a robots head.(visible below)

Heh...nice one Rito
I gotta give them one for this, just very well made

honestly the first game really got me, i had played about 5 matches that morning and then this thing came up i was like cool, but wtf this fkn lee sin ganking hard and on top of that fkn taunting his mastery 5. Really well done april fools joke. But seriously can we keep the (ALL) chat muted for ever please
funny enough lee is the only bot that actually uses his mastery emote. all others wont
You do know there is an option to disable all chat, right?
